profile:
Five Star Painting is a locally owned and operated house painting company servicing the West GTA Area.
 
As a part of an international painting franchise system, we give you the peace of mind knowing that we're not a "fly-by-night" contractor that will cut corners or leave the job incomplete. 
 
We provide: 
FREE COLOUR CONSULTATION session with our INTERIOR DESIGNER
PREMIUM ENVIRONMENT-FRIENDLY ZERO VOC PAINTS
 
EXTENDED MANUFACTURER PAINT WARRANTY
EXTENDED LABOUR WARRANTY 
 
QUALIFIED PAINTERS
 
ON-TIME GUARANTEE
BEST PRICE GUARANTEE
 
Thorough Surface Preparation 
A responsive management team should there be any challenges 
Detailed pricing that lets you know what you are getting for your money
 
We are available 24/7 to take your call. Our customer service department will ask for some basic information about your project and will schedule one of our estimators to come out to discuss your project. Our estimators will confirm your appointment, show up on time, and will provide you a detailed quote of the work discussed. It's that simple! 

We are a licensed and insured company that distinguishes our company from smaller and insecure businesses.

We strive to exceed your expectations and focus all of our energy and resources on delivering outstanding results.
hours: Mon-Fri 6:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m. Sat-Sun 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.
services: House Painting, Interior Painting, Exterior Painting, Residential Painting, and Commercial Painting
specialities:
Exterior House Painting and Staining
    Interior House Painting
    Deck/Fence Paint and Stain
    Wood & Siding Repairs
    Power Washing
    Drywall Repairs
    Stucco Repairs and Painting
    Commercial Painting and Staining
    Minor repairs
    FREE Color Consultations

profile:
Trying to remodel a bathroom by yourself? Forget the hassle and let the Bathroom Builders team efficiently install your bathroom to eliminate your stress.
The process starts with a fun and informative in-home consultation with your personal Bathroom Builders design consultant. We provide this service free of charge, so you have nothing to lose and everything to learn! Your design consultant will simplify the sometimes complex home renovation process by walking you through product selection and design.
When it’s time to start constructing your new bathroom, factory-trained Bathroom Builders installers will complete your project in as little as a few days, answering any questions along the way. Our professional installers will respect your family’s home. They’ll be on time, courteous and, most importantly, they’ll get the job done right the first time.
Bathroom Builders install both our own line of products and products from the best national brands. With countless colors, textures and styles to choose from, if you can dream it, we can likely make it happen. Learn more about our bathroom remodeling products: Explore our replacement bathtubs, walk-in bathtubs, bathtub to shower conversions, bathroom vanities, bathroom flooring and more.
Bathroom Builders are fully licensed and insured. Bathroom builders brand products carry a manufacturer's limited lifetime warranty against product defects. Financing is available. We proudly serve in all of the Greater Toronto Area including Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Toronto, Richmond Hill, and Vaughan

profile:
At Five Star Painting, we understand the importance of color. From a fresh exterior paint job that improves the curb appeal of your home or business, to interior paint that brings style and feeling to your daily life, paint can make all the difference. Don’t put off that painting project any longer, call the professionals at Five Star Painting and start enjoying your freshly painted home sooner than later.
We believe we're a step above the competition and that you can have confidence choosing us. This starts with an exact estimate based on actual measurements of your project, then followed up with a thorough walk-through and a 2-year warranty. We pride ourselves in taking extra special care of our customers: read what some of our customers have said about our work!
**Contact Five Star Painting for a Free Estimate**

We at Marvellous Contracting believe that our service, Quality and Craftsmanship is our number one priority in the services we have to offer! 
We are fully licensed and insured. We will not be satisfied until our customers are completely satisfied. 
We are focused on giving quality client care to every one of our customers. 

Our dedication is to work with every customer from the planning stage to the development stage to guarantee your necessities are met in a convenient way. 
All remodels will run into startling difficulties, and we will work with you to guarantee these are set out agreeable to you and, obviously, to code! 
Our responsibility likewise guarantees spotless and respectful staff, and a clean work territory, which is tidied up toward the finish of each workday.

Call us today and find out how we can help you with your upcoming project at an affordable cost!

profile: Objective of Zenith Contracting is to provide remodelling and modernization services to commercial, private and multi-residential buildings. The key to our success thus far has been client satisfaction, meaning we don't leave the job site without attaining the approval of the client! Some of the services we offer include but are not limited to refinishing stairs, refinishing hardwood, laying tiles, vinyl, laminate and hardwood. We also specialize in painting and electrical work such as pot lights and wiring. Other services are available upon request.

profile: We are a painting company in business for over 15 years we do Residential and Commercial painting ,from custom homes to commercial buildings we do it all , We have all 5 star google reviews ,feel free to check us out on social media, We have 2 million liability insurance and we are WSIB Compliant. Areas we serve are Niagara Falls and area, St Cathrines, Vineland, Beamsville, Grimsby, Stoney Creek, Hamilton, Ancaster, Burlington, Dundas. Why Choose Peninsula Painting Contractors ,We treat your home or business like it’s ours. This means using only the best quality painting products and services for each project. Our painting contractors go above and beyond to ensure your local painting service is a delightful experience from start to finish. We select the highest performing paints, primers and repair materials that will leave your space looking beautiful for years to come. Our experience in interior and exterior painting projects paired with Peninsula’s streamlined booking process puts us ahead of other painters in the region. Whether you require Peninsula Painting for residential or commercial painting projects, our painting professionals are there with you every step of the way to answer your questions before, during and after your project has been completed .Our Commitment to Customers, At Peninsula Painting, we stand by the work we do, as it’s our mission to provide the highest quality of craftsmanship with unparalleled customer support, reliability and integrity. We specialize in interior and exterior painting for residential and commercial jobs so you can feel confident that you’ll always love your home or business's new look! Contact us today for a free quote.

profile:
Hey! Arran MacDonald here. Thank you for taking the time to check out our business. 

I began painting in university for a local business while I was finishing my bachelors degree. I quickly gained a passion for providing exceptional results for my clients. There is no better feeling than producing a product that a client loves. That is what I love to do! 

Here at HECRA, we pride ourselves on not only providing exceptional results, but providing our clients with tremendous customer service. 

You matter. We value you and your happiness. We believe that open communication and honesty lead to the BEST service experience. Please do not hestiate to ask questions or express concerns. WE WANT YOU TO BE HAPPY!

We look forward to working with you!

profile:
We consistently strive to provide our wonderful clients the best interior home painting experience. Our friendly painting contractors provide top-quality interior painting in an exceptionally timely manner. We offer free no-obligation home improvement consultations in Toronto and the GTA. During the consultation, we use our wealth of expertise to provide you with an accurate estimate and to help you find the perfect paint colours that will enhance the beauty and value of your home. We offer a full suite of interior painting services: drywall installation and repair, ceiling, door, trim, and wall painting, popcorn ceiling removal, staircase painting and refinishing, and wallpaper installation. From condominiums to single-detached houses, we have the professional experience and equipment to deliver a precise and clean job.

Give us a call today at 365-688-2945.
